SiteFooter.title: Starter
SiteFooter.description: Next.js template with i18n, dark theme, TanStack Query, ky, env validation, blog, and shadcn UI.

HeroSection.description: i18n, dark theme, TanStack Query, ky, env validation, blog, shadcn UI. One repo. Zero config headaches.

features.i18nParagraph: Multiple locales, RTL support, next-intl. Routing and messages wired so you can go global from day one.
features.darkThemeParagraph: next-themes and CSS variables. Toggle in the header, preference persisted. No flicker.
features.remoteStateManagementParagraph: TanStack Query for server state, ky for fetching. Caching and loading states handled so you focus on UI.
features.envValidationParagraph: Typed env with Zod and @t3-oss/env-nextjs. Fail at build or runtime if something is missing.
features.blogParagraph: MDX-ready structure so you can add a blog or docs without rethinking the stack.
features.shadcnUIParagraph: Buttons, cards, forms, dialogs. Copy-paste components that respect your theme and accessibility.

WhySection.title: Stop configuring. Start building.
WhySection.description: Every choice in this template is deliberate: proven libraries, clear structure, type safety. Clone it, add your content and API keys, and ship.

BlogsSection.title: Blog
BlogsSection.description: Insights, tutorials, and thoughts on modern software development

notFound.title: Nothing to see here
notFound.description: Page you are trying to open does not exist. You may have mistyped the address, or the page has been moved to another URL.

forbidden.title: Access Denied
forbidden.description: You don't have permission to access this resource. Contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.

unauthorized.title: Authentication Required
unauthorized.description: You need to sign in to access this page.

error.title: An error occurred
error.description: Please try again or contact support if the problem persists.
